game.name: A Plunge into Darkness
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: What happens when a group of friends decides to visit a mysterious, haunted castle? What started as a bit of fun is about to become a life-changing event for them. But the real question is: can they make it out of the castle alive?
game.shortDescriptionEn: What happens when a group of friends decides to visit a mysterious, haunted castle? What started as a bit of fun is about to become a life-changing event for them. But the real question is: can they make it out of the castle alive?
